title: Playdate Squad Achievements Schema
description: The necessary structure for a game's achievements.json file.

name.description: Nicely formatted name for your game.

author.description: Nicely formatted author for your game.

version.description: Nicely formatted version string for your game.

iconPath.description: Path to the 32x32 .png icon to use as your game's icon.

cardPath.description: Path to the 380x90 .png art to use as your game's card art.

specVersion.description: The specification version this data is based on in semver.

achievements.description: List of configured achievements for your game.

name.description: Nicely formatted name for the achievement. Shown to the player.

description.description: Nicely formatted description for the achievement. Shown to the player.

descriptionLocked.description: Nicely formatted description for the ungranted version of the achievement. Shown the the player.

isSecret.description: Determines if the achievement should be hidden until granted.

icon.description: Path to the achievement's 32x32 .png icon within AchievementImages/.

iconLocked.description: Path to the achievement's 32x32 .png icon within AchievementImages/ (shown when the achievement is not yet granted).

grantedAt.description: If this is false, the achievement has not yet been granted. If it is an integer, that integer is the Playdate epoch second at which the achievement was granted.

progressMax.description: If this achievement is progression based, this is the limit at which the achievement will be automatically granted.

progress.description: How much progress has been made towards 'progressMax'.

progressIsPercentage.description: Indicates if this achievement's progress should be shown to the player as a percentage.

scoreValue.description: How much weight this achievement carries towards 100% game completion.

examples.description: Auto-generated random achievement for achievement viewer testing.
examples.name: Generated Achievement 1
